HomePage.title: Speech-to-Text with Whisper
HomePage.description: Transform your audio into accurate text transcriptions

TranscribePage.title: Transcribe
TranscribePage.description: Convert your audio files into text
TranscribePage.configurationRequiredDesc: Please select both an audio file and a Whisper model from the home page to proceed with transcription.
TranscribePage.webSupportComingSoonDesc: Transcription is currently only available in the desktop platforms. Web support will be available in a future update.
TranscribePage.androidSupportComingSoonDesc: Transcription is currently only available on desktop platforms. Android support will be available in a future update.
TranscribePage.readyToTranscribeDesc: Transcription interface will be implemented here.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage your application preferences and customize your experience.

ModeCard.title: Modes
ModeCard.description: Choose your mode or customize your style

ThemesList.title: Themes
ThemesList.noThemesDescription: No themes match your search term.

AudioSelectCard.title: Audio File Selection
AudioSelectCard.description: Select an audio file for transcription

ModelSelectCard.title: Whisper Model Selection
ModelSelectCard.description: Select a Whisper model to use for transcription
ModelSelectCard.noModelsFound: No .bin models found in the selected path
ModelSelectCard.pathRequired: Please select a model path first

LanguageOptionsCard.title: Language Options
LanguageOptionsCard.description: Select the audio language and translation options
LanguageOptionsCard.audioLanguageDescription: Choose the language of your audio file or let Whisper detect it automatically
LanguageOptionsCard.translateToEnglishDescription: Automatically translate the transcription result to English

PerformanceOptionsCard.title: Performance Options
PerformanceOptionsCard.description: Configure processing performance and hardware acceleration
PerformanceOptionsCard.gpuAccelerationDescription: Use GPU for faster transcription (requires Vulkan support)
PerformanceOptionsCard.gpuMacosWarning: GPU acceleration is not yet available on macOS. This feature requires the desktop application running on Windows or Linux.
PerformanceOptionsCard.gpuWebWarning: GPU acceleration is not yet available on web browsers. This feature requires the desktop application running on Windows or Linux.
PerformanceOptionsCard.gpuAndroidWarning: GPU acceleration is not yet available on Android. This feature requires the desktop application running on Windows or Linux.
PerformanceOptionsCard.cpuThreadsDescription: Number of CPU threads to use for transcription processing

AdvancedOptionsCard.title: Advanced Options
AdvancedOptionsCard.description: Fine-tune transcription behavior for accuracy and performance.
AdvancedOptionsCard.samplingStrategyDescription: Greedy is faster, while Beam Search can be more accurate but is slower.
AdvancedOptionsCard.bestOfDescription: Number of candidates to consider. Higher values increase accuracy at the cost of performance.
AdvancedOptionsCard.beamSizeDescription: Number of beams to use. Higher values increase accuracy at the cost of performance.
AdvancedOptionsCard.patienceDescription: Controls stopping criterion for beam search. Higher values may improve accuracy but increase time.
AdvancedOptionsCard.lengthPenaltyDescription: Penalizes longer transcriptions. <1.0 favors shorter, >1.0 favors longer results.
AdvancedOptionsCard.temperatureDescription: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.
AdvancedOptionsCard.maxSegmentLengthDescription: Max number of characters per segment. 0 means no limit.
AdvancedOptionsCard.initialPromptDescription: Provide a prompt to guide the model and improve accuracy for specific words or context.
AdvancedOptionsCard.initialPromptPlaceholder: e.g., The speaker mentions Züstand and Tauri...
AdvancedOptionsCard.suppressNonSpeechTokensDescription: Prevent special tokens like [Music] or [Applause] from appearing in the output.
AdvancedOptionsCard.tokenTimestampsDescription: Generate timestamps for each token. Useful for subtitles.
AdvancedOptionsCard.splitOnWordDescription: Split segments on word boundaries instead of characters.
AdvancedOptionsCard.suppressBlankDescription: Suppress blank outputs at the beginning of the transcription.
AdvancedOptionsCard.gpuDeviceIndexDescription: If you have multiple GPUs, specify the index of the one to use (e.g., 0, 1).
